customer_name: MELODI L. CONNOR CHRISTOPHER J. CONNOR

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am on
8/21/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone at 11:10am upon arrival to the facility, and again at
11:44am just before leaving the facility. The inspector waited near the entrance gait and left the premises after no contact
was made with the licensee after 34 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10 am on 
8/21/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by phone at 11:10am upon arrival to the facility, and again at 
11:44am just before leaving the facility. The inspector waited near the entrance gait and left the premises after no contact 
was made with the licensee after 34 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection 
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
